name: Lycan
title: Banehallow
lore: Banehallow was once a noble, but was cursed by the moon to become the Lycan. He embraced his wolf nature.

summonWolves.name: Summon Wolves
summonWolves.description: Summons two wolves to fight alongside Lycan. Wolves gain abilities at higher levels.

howl.name: Howl
howl.description: Grants bonus damage to Lycan, his wolves, and nearby allies.

feralImpulse.name: Feral Impulse
feralImpulse.description: Grants Lycan and his units bonus attack damage and health regeneration.

shapeshift.name: Shapeshift
shapeshift.description: Lycan transforms into a wolf with maximum movement speed, critical strike, and night vision.
